p: Personal interventions include, frequent hand washing after every 15–20 min [ 29], use of hand sanitizers with ≥60% alcohol content, wearing face masks, encouraging people to cover their mouth and nose during coughing and sneezing, keeping a distance from sick people, avoiding contact with face and mouth with unwashed hands [ 41, 45], and self-quarantine when a person feels unwell [ 41]. Whereas, community-based mitigation strategies include, social distancing, avoiding crowded areas, and restriction on public gathering and non-essential traveling [ 29, 41].
